title: Opportunities Overview
description: Comparison of the Total Digital Ready Sales Campaign Opportunity by Architecture with the active pipeline created in SFDC. The SFDC pipeline shows only the deals that are tagged with 'Cisco Refresh' and has commit or upside status for the Architecture groups and sub groups defined by the campaign opportunity rules.

title: Shipment History
descriptions: Total Refresh Opportunity by Architecture and by their Ship Fiscal Year.

Total Product Net value on the opportunities in SFDC that are tagged with 'Cisco Refresh' and are in 'booked' status. It represent the 'converted' product expected net value since the inception of the sales campaign for the Architecture groups and sub groups defined by the campaign opportunity rules.

title: Opportunities by Sales Levels
description:
Sales Level - Total Digital Ready Scorecard Opportunity for each Sales Level according to the sales hierarchy.

Partner - Total Digital Ready Scorecard Opportunity for the top 100 Partners.

Customer - Total Digital Ready Scorecard Opportunity for the top Sales Account View (SAV) names.

The color coding provide the health of the Sales Level in terms of actionable opportunity coverage with active SFDC Pipeline:

Green - SFDC Pipeline is greater than actionable opportunity.

Amber - SFDC Pipeline is less than actionable opportunity.

Red - There is no SFDC Pipeline for the actionable opportunity.

Black There is no available opportunity for this Sales Level.
